name: Rogue Company: Standard Founder's Pack
description:
It’s time to go Rogue!

The Rogue Company Standard Founder's Pack grants early access to the game and has everything you need to go into battle. Recruit eight extra playable Rogues, plus you’ll instantly unlock four in game cosmetic items to make sure you’re carrying out the mission in style!

This Bundle includes:

Immediate access to the Rogue Company Closed Beta before it becomes Free-To-Play at a later date Eight Extra Playable Rogues: Phantom, Chaac, Lancer, Vy, Scorch, Talon, Gl1tch, and an upcoming Rogue Rare Exterminatin Chaac Outfit Rare Speed Demon Ronin Outfit Epic Solar Flare Weapon Wrap Epic Superstar Dance Emote Rare Founder Spray
